divs: sighting details i attended the 4th of july fireworks display inthe town of henrietta, ny on 7\4\2001. at approx. 10:10 pm i noticed that westof the fireworks were at least 5 white balls of light - they appeared as largestars. i thenwatched them travel at a very high rate of speed for only a veryshort distance.after that they would come back into the same line they wereoriginally inand just sit there, hovering as if they were watching thefireworks. i knowothers saw them, pointed to them and looked with disbelief, buti dont knowif they reported them. the person with me that night wont allow meto list her name. she wont talk to anyone about it. shes very frightened ofthe subject. the lights were still there as we were driving away. i felt warmduring the sighting, and watched in an almost trance-like state - but felt verycold\shivery as we began walking to the car to leave. my friend was in abighurry to get out of there.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Henrietta
This sighting has never been favorited.
